quote: I have always loved him. Every single minute of every single day my heart has belonged to him. I have just run away from the truth. I have covered it in shrouds of friendship and teenage crush.
quote_letters: I HAVE ALWAYS LOVED HIM EVERY SINGLE MINUTE OF EVERY SINGLE DAY MY HEART HAS BELONGED TO HIM I HAVE JUST RUN AWAY FROM THE TRUTH I HAVE COVERED IT IN SHROUDS OF FRIENDSHIP AND TEENAGE CRUSH
